task.title: Install the iiRDS plugin from the DITA-OT registry
task.shortdesc: The iiRDS plugin can be installed offline from a ZIP archive or online from the DITA-OT registry. This topic describes the online installation.

taskbody.prereq: Your computer is connected to the internet.

step.cmd: In the bin directory of your DITA-OT installation, open a command-line client.
In the command-line client, run dita install org.iirds.dita.package.

result.p: The org.iirds.dita.package plugin is installed in your DITA-OT.

taskbody.postreq: You can build iiRDS packages from your DITA content.
